Html:
Hello

I fixed a bug in the AutoCompleteBox (http://wpf.codeplex.com/workitem/13476) and
if I use my newly built  WPFToolkit.dll in my project, then I get the error, that
“A strongly-named assembly is required”.

How can I build the WPFToolkit with strong names?

Are there any source files for building WPFToolkit.msi?

Thanks in advance, kind regards, 
Thomas
